      continue. Terminate iteration Control
Valid only inside an explicit_definition.

Stops executing any further sentences in the given block during the current iteration, but continues with the next iteration.
Use within the block delimited byâ¦
    * for._..._end.
    * for_ijk._..._end.
    * while._..._end.
    * whilst._..._end.
To understand the difference between (break.) and (continue.) see More Information in Terminate_loop (break.).
